inputs.name: datasetFolder
inputs.purpose: Path to the root of the unzipped XJTU-SY dataset. If not specified, a dialog will prompt.

inputs.name: outputFolder
inputs.purpose: Path where .mat files for each ensemble member will be saved. If not specified, a dialog will prompt.

outputs.name: ensemble
outputs.purpose: fileEnsembleDatastore object referencing the processed data.

inputs.name: outputFolder
inputs.purpose: Specifies location of .mat files of members.

data.getXJTUSYFilesPerOpCond.description: Retrieve file paths for the XJTU-SY dataset, grouped by operating condition. Returns a table with columns for speed, load, and bearing file paths. If no folder is specified, opens a folder selection dialog.

inputs.name: dataEnsembleFolder
inputs.purpose: Root folder containing XJTU-SY dataset files. If not provided or empty, prompts user with folder selection dialog.

outputs.name: ocToFiles
outputs.purpose: Table with columns 'Speed', 'Load', and 'Files' where 'Files' is a cell array of strings for each operating condition.
